name: Super-Patriota Simulator
description:
This game is a work of fiction inspired by real events.

The Super-Patriot is the hero of the nation! Fighting for all of us, he is in the streets blocking highways, hugging trucks, crying on walls, and calling for military intervention!

A satirical sandbox with a compilation of what happened after the elections in a certain country in East America called Zebril!
Set up your camp, vibrate with fake news, and save the world from the communist threat!

- Various missions such as: block roads, protest at barrack doors, fight communists, save puppies, and sing the anthem to a tire.
- Random events such as: clashes with police, storms in the camps, and infiltrators eating for free.

Help the project continue by giving feedbacks and suggestions in the discussion forum.
